Summary: First observed giant white light flying object changed shape. Observed similar May 22, no pictures.
divs: Sighting Details1. Inside house waiting for radio program to come on at midnight, looked out window. 2. Gian light. 3. No idea-unusual. 4. Object seemed to change shape, I thought I was filming same objecting but not certain 5.Grabed camera and went outside. It was something different then I had ever observed before. It was beautiful to see. 6. Watched until it disappeared.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Olathe
There was one other sighting in Olathe on or around May 14th 2013
